name: Kotlin Multiplatform
description:
This plugin for IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio enables you to develop Kotlin Multiplatform applications targeting Android, iOS, desktop, web, and server.
  • Write business logic and UI once, and run your app on all supported platforms.
  • Run, debug, and test applications on both iOS and Android directly from the IDE.
  • Create a new multiplatform project in just a few clicks within the IDE.
  • Preflight checks help you configure your environment – you’re always ready for takeoff.
  • Get basic Swift support in the IDE, including navigation, quick documentation, and cross-language debugging tools.

More about Kotlin Multiplatform


The plugin currently supports macOS, with Windows and Linux support coming soon.

Getting started

https://www.jetbrains.com/help/kotlin-multiplatform-dev/get-started.html
notes:
• New Project wizard
  • Preflight checks
  • Run configurations for Android, iOS, web, desktop, and server
  • Swift Cross-language support
  • Compose Multiplatform support is integrated
  • Support for Compose Hot Reload
